mapper.select: Select a.dept_id, a.parent_id, a.ancestors, a.dept_name, a.order_num, a.leader, a.phone, a.email, a.status, a.del_flag, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time,b.user_id, b.dept_id, b.user_name, b.nick_name, b.user_type, b.email, b.phonenumber, b.sex, b.avatar, b.password, b.status, b.del_flag, b.create_by, b.create_time, b.update_by, b.update_time, b.remark from KCD86049.SYS_DEPT as a , KCD86049.SYS_USER as b where a.DEPT_ID = b.DEPT_ID
